column1: /* aplus css needed to override aui on the detail page */
.aplus-v2 .aplus-module table.aplus-chart.a-bordered tr td,.aplus-v2 .aplus-module table.aplus-chart.a-bordered tr th {border-bottom:1px dotted #999;}
.aplus-v2 .apm-sidemodule {text-align:left; margin:0 auto; width:970px; padding:0; background-color:#ffffff; position:relative;}
.aplus-v2 .apm-sidemodule-textright {width:470px; position:relative; display:table-cell; vertical-align:middle; padding-left:40px; height:300px; max-height:300px;}
.aplus-v2 .apm-sidemodule-textleft {width:630px; position:relative; display:table-cell; vertical-align:middle; padding-left:200px; height:300px; max-height:300px;}

.aplus-v2 th.apm-tablemodule-keyhead {border-top:1px solid #dddddd; padding:8px 14px 6px !important; background-color:#f7f7f7; font-weight:normal; color:#626262; float:none !important; margin-right:0; text-align:center; width:106px;}

.aplus-v2 tr.apm-tablemodule-keyvalue td {padding-top:8px !important; padding-left:14px; padding-bottom:8px; border-top:1px solid #dddddd; border-bottom:1px solid #dddddd; text-align:center;width:inherit!important}
.aplus-v2 .apm-hovermodule {text-align:left; margin:0 auto; width:970px; padding: 0; background-color:#ffffff; height:300px; position:relative;}

.aplus-v2 .apm-heromodule-textright {float:right; right:50px; margin-top:100px; padding:15px; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#BBBBBB,endColorstr=#FFFFFF); background-color: rgb(0,0,0); background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.7);color:white; width:250px;}

.aplus-v2 .module-12 .textright {float:right; right:50px; margin-top:100px; padding:15px; color:black; width:250px; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr=#BBBBBB,endColorstr=#FFFFFF); background-color: rgb(255,255,255); background-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);}
.aplus-v2 h1, .aplus-v2 h2, .aplus-v2 h3, .aplus-v2 h4 {font-family: Arial,sans-serif;text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;padding-bottom: 4px;}
.aplus-v2 h1, .aplus-v2 h2, .aplus-v2 h3, .aplus-v2 h4, .aplus-v2 h5, .aplus-v2 h6 {padding: 0;margin: 0;}
div.aplus-v2 div.faq-all-container h3{font-size:36px;font-weight:normal;text-align: left;font-family: Arial,sans-serif; margin: 0 0 14px 0; margin-bottom: 0px;}
div.aplus-v2 h3.module18Header {font-size:36px;font-weight:normal;text-align: left;font-family: Arial,sans-serif; margin: 0 0 14px 0; margin-bottom: 0px;}
div.aplus-v2 div.ingredients-container div.all-ingredients-header { font-size: 36px; line-height: 36px; margin-bottom: 25px; text-align:left;;}
div.aplus-v2 div.carousel-container #from-slideshow img{width:auto;width:500px \9} /* removing for for carousel, reinvestigate max-width:none; height:670px; */

Enjoy endless conversations and non stop entertainment thanks to an unparalleled battery life. Tank Xtreme 2.4 is equipped with an 1650mAh battery, that gives you up to 16 hours of conversation and up to 30 days of stand by.

The Tank Xtreme 2.4 was constructed with durability and a great hand held experience in mind. With a dual injection design concept as the forefront of the manufacturing, Tank Xtreme 2.4 will surely be the most reliable phone you’ve ever owned.
VGA camera with LED flash for great pictures.
MP3 player. Listen to all your favorite music.
FM radio. Tune in your favorite stations. MP4 player. Watch your videos. Bluetooth for sharing media. Games for entertainment.

The Tank Xtreme 2.4 is water and dust resistant. Backed by the IP65 water and dust certification, the Tank Xtreme 2.4 is designed and reinforced with a rubberized shock absorbent material. With durability in mind, nothing is too tough for the Tank Xtreme 2.4.
With the ease of strap insert built in the Tank Xtreme 2.4, you will securely have your phone on you at all times in any situation.
The BLU Tank Xtreme 2.4 can withstand drops and is shock resistant. With rubber dual injection that serves as a cushion and absorbs the impact, while dispersing the force and protecting the phone.

With design and craftsmanship being a staple in the production of the VIVO 5 Mini, BLU uses state of the art CNC milling along with aircraft grade aluminum. The uni-body design offers a rigid infrastructure and the touch panel consists of a liquid like curved glass for magnificent design.
Available in Gold, Grey, Silver and Rose Gold.

The VIVO 5 Mini has a MediaTek 6580 1.3GHz Quad-Core processor. Store you favorite movies, music and pictures on the 8GB internal memory. Need more space? Plug in a MicroSD card for an additional 64GB memory.
The VIVO 5 Mini blends technology and design into an incredible package.
Incorporating the highest-grade material such as curved glass touch panel with color match finish ensures excellent feedback and feel, as well as a gorgeous look.

Capture all those favorite moments with crisp and sharp clarity on the VIVO 5 Mini’s 5MP camera. Take those selfies with an equally impressive 2MP front camera. All your pictures will definitely be frame worthy.

The VIVO 8, crafted with precise engineering for a top tier smartphone. The VIVO 8 has an 87% metal to body ratio and it is structurally reliable without compromise to design. Color matched curved glass form a super smooth front display that is aesthetically superior.
The VIVO 8 provides unparalleled performance with it’s MediaTek Helio P10 chipset and a 2.0GHz Octa Core processor. Paired with blazing 4GB of RAM, there is nothing this smartphone cannot handle.

The VIVO 8 is equipped with a generous 64GB internal memory that offers plenty of space to download and store all your favorite music, video and pictures. Additionally, the VIVO 8 comes with a built in MicroSD card slot that allow for an extra 64GB of space.
Read more

The VIVO 8 provides a visual experience like no other. A gorgeous 5.5” Full HD In-Cell display with an explosive 1080 x 1920 resolution and 401ppi, pictures are transformed into stunning images and cinema like video quality. High contrast and vivid saturation ensures that whatever is displayed will be perfect.

Those moments you definitely want to capture in all their glory will be caught effortlessly with the new VIVO 8. With a 13 megapixel main camera equipped with a state of the art SONY IMX 258 sensor, working in tandem with a 16MP selfie camera. Each and every memorable image or video will be cherished forever.
